name: Adlib Instrument Bank
summary: Learn about .BNK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The bank file used by Adlib Tracker II has the .A2B extension.
NOTE: AdLib Visual Composer is a DOS oriented program and can be run on Windows with a DOS plugin.

description: Instrument banks accessed by Adlib Visual Composer, a music composition program; designed to be loaded with .ROL files; contains custom instrument data to accompany the ROL files that contain the notes to play the instruments that make up the scores.
